result.eng: The house is at the top of the hill.
result.ga: tá an teach ag barr an chnoic
result.orig: Tá an teach ag barr an chnoic
result.html: tá an teach ag barr an chnoicThe house is at the top of the hill.
result.ponchtml: tá an teaċ ag barr an ċnoicThe house is at the top of the hill.

result.eng: I can't see the tower, a hill is in my way.
result.ga: ní féidir liom an túr a fheiceáil tá cnoc sa bhealach orm
result.orig: Ní féidir liom an túr a fheiceáil tá cnoc sa bhealach orm
result.html: ní féidir liom an túr a fheiceáil tá cnoc sa bhealach ormI can't see the tower, a hill is in my way.
result.ponchtml: ní féidir liom an túr a ḟeiceáil tá cnoc sa ḃealaċ ormI can't see the tower, a hill is in my way.

result.eng: The hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.
result.ga: bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.orig: Bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibhe
result.html: bhí dreach dorcha uaigneach ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar bharr an tsléibheThe hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.
result.ponchtml: ḃí dreaċ dorċa uaigneaċ ar na cnoic agus scamall ceo ina luí ar ḃarr an tsléiḃeThe hills looked dark and lonely with a cloud of fog lying on the top of the mountain.
